mapper.update: UPDATE t_article SET comments = comments - 1 WHERE id = #{articleId} AND comments > 0
UPDATE t_article SET favors = favors - 1 WHERE id = #{articleId} AND favors > 0
mapper.select: u.comments "user.comments", u.posts "user.posts", u.fans "user.fans", act.content "editor" FROM t_article a LEFT JOIN t_user u ON u.id = a.author_id LEFT JOIN t_article_content act ON act.id = a.id WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.`status` = 10

a.`status` = #{status} AND u.id = #{userId} AND a.featured = 10 AND a.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY (a.favors + FLOOR(a.views / 3)) DESC ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
SELECT a.id,a.title,a.favors,a.views FROM t_article a WHERE a.`status` = 10 AND a.featured = 10 GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY (a.favors + FLOOR(a.views / 3)) DESC ORDER BY a.create_time DESC LIMIT #{count}
mapper.sql: group_concat(CONCAT(ac.id,'---',ac.original,'---',ac.preview,'---',ac.store) separator '===') accessorys FROM t_article a LEFT JOIN t_article_accessory ac ON ac.to_id = a.id LEFT JOIN t_user u ON u.id = a.author_id

SELECT u.id "user.id", u.nick_name "user.nickName", u.user_name "user.userName", u.avatar "user.avatar", a.id, a.author_id, a.comments, a.favors, a.belong_group, a.images, a.last_image_id, a.summary, a.tags, a.title, a.views, a.create_time, a.featured,
